active.description: If `true`, the button is represented as active.

colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

disableRipple.description: If `true`, disable ripple effects when pressing a element.

endIcon.description: The icon to display at the end side of the button.

fullRounded.description: If `true`, the button is full rounded. Else, it'll be slightly round.

isActive.description: If `true`, the button is represented as active.

isLoading.description: If `true`, the loading state of the button is represented.

isRounded.description: If `true`, the button is full rounded. Else, it'll be slightly round.

leftIcon.description: The icon to display at the left side of the button.

loading.description: If `true`, the loading state of the button is represented.

loadingIcon.description: The icon to display when the button is loading.

loadingPlacement.description: The placement of the loading indicator. Accepts `start` or `end`.

loadingText.description: The text to display when the button is loading.

rightIcon.description: The icon to display at the right side of the button.

startIcon.description: The icon to display at the start side of the button.

attached.description: If `true`, the borderRadius of button that are direct children will be altered to look flushed together.

disabled.description: If `true`, all wrapped button will be disabled.

isAttached.description: If `true`, the borderRadius of button that are direct children will be altered to look flushed together.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, all wrapped button will be disabled.

active.description: If `true`, the button is represented as active.

disableRipple.description: If `true`, disable ripple effects when pressing a element.

fullRounded.description: If `true`, the button is full rounded. Else, it'll be slightly round.

icon.description: The icon to be used in the button.

isActive.description: If `true`, the button is represented as active.

isLoading.description: If `true`, the loading state of the button is represented.

isRounded.description: If `true`, the button is full rounded. Else, it'll be slightly round.

loading.description: If `true`, the loading state of the button is represented.
